attributes.action: bring back the death sentence for all serious crimes only
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the death sentance is the only way for sure to stop all those serious reapeting offenders..and only after major investigations...it will stop over crowding in prisons and give peace of mind to all victims friends and family..and will give a shockwave to all future and present criminals...it will also show that the goverment is back in the stronghold of control of the law...this law should be thought out carefully and as i said only after major investagation..

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
